data.message:
Well he lost me as a fan.....He's just as stupid as the rest of them. Not like he cares much he has tonnes of money. Guess he's blind to see that all the illegals and the immigrants have been and will continue to take all the jobs. But he doesn't need to worry about getting a job hes a millionaire.
FUCK YOU!

replies.message: Calls Eminem dumb, still has spelling and grammatical errors in his comment.

Keegan Graham Thank you for the lesson! I have 1 spelling error whoopty doo da! Call the grammar police is that the best you can come up with? Maybe I should cry about you hurting my feelings and produce a shitty ass freestyle rap about it. Holy shit dude seriously!
Sorry I pointed out the obvious and made you mad. Here is a tissue for your issue. Enjoy your evening on facebook 😁

Did you apply to pick up our crops and lost that job to an illegal? Did you sign up to be a dishwasher and an immigrant took that opportunity away? Did you fill an application for a job in construction and an undocumented man took it from you? Please tell me more about these jobs you were so willing to do hun.
Notice em throwing up the devil horns . He’s an establishment scumbag
Amberly Turner omg so tell us all about how an illegal took your job.  🙄
Lindsay Taylor you literally have to be blind not to see them taking jobs away.  I guess living in ignorance is your normal.
I'm sure he will lose tons of sleep
It's not that they're taking our jobs, employers choose to exploit them over hiring american's a living wage ;)
Robots are taking your jobs not immigrants 🤣... it’s called Automation 🤖
I’m sure if you looked back on your family tree, your family was once immigrants.....

Lol if an immigrant has more intelligence and better work ethic to take your job.

You must be really shit.
Bye! 😂😂
I’m sure he’s crying so hard right now... you mean so much to him... GTFOH👎
Wow you sure told him
Keegan Graham I think your the one in need of a tissue since your crying about grammar.
Saire Yesenia Do you even live in Canada? Jobs are taken by immigrants every day here. Wish we had Trump over here because Trudeau is doing a shit job.
Ashli Marler There are not many illegals in Canada but I know they are taking YOUR jobs lmao
Faith Harris my family tree founded Canada lmao We are British and we made this country here in Canada. Also I have extended native as well. My family has been in Canada for more than 150 years.

Nas Knight uuuummmm they are taking the grunt work jobs that our students need to get by during the summer months eg. Tim Hortons gas station attendant and or front desk, Quicky store. Look around. They hire their own.
Keegan Graham btw I'm not a HE retard.
Amberly Turner I glad that Eminem did it and it makes me happy...I got a idea for you suck it up and you need to take his advice.
Oh yeah they are taking All the jobs 😂😂😂 my gawd
